info.title: Purchase Contracts
info.description: This service enables you to read, create, and update purchase contracts through an API call from a source system outside SAP S/4HANA Cloud. The service contains header, item, item conditions, account assignment, address, Header notes, Item notes and partner nodes.

x-sap-shortText: Read, create, and update purchase contracts using this asynchronous inbound API

values.text: [Collaborative Manufacturing with SAP Digital Manufacturing Cloud(1NX)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1NX " Link To BP ")
[Service Procurement with SAP Business Network and SAP Fieldglass(4R2)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/4R2 " Link To BP ")
[Service and Material Procurement - Project-Based Services(J13)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/J13 " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Procurement: Purchasing Document (MM_PURDOC_HEADER)
* Procurement: Purchasing Document Item (MM_PURDOC_ITEM)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

get.summary: Gets the details of all the accounting assignments of all the items, in all the purchase contracts in the system
get.description: Gets the details of all the accounting assignments of all the items, in all the purchase contracts in the system. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.summary: Creates an account assignment for all the items in all the purchase contracts in the system
post.description: Creates an account assignment to all the purchase contracts in the system. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.

get.summary: Gets the account assignment details of a specific accounting line of an item in a purchase contract
get.description: Gets the account assignment details of a specific accounting line of an item in a purchase contract, such as GL acocunt, cost center, and so on, using the purchase contract number, item number, and serial number of the accounting line provided.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates the account assignment details of a specific accounting line of an item in a purchase contract
patch.description: Updates the account assignment details of a specific accounting line of an item in a purchase contract. This is done using the purchase contract number, item number, and serial number of the accounting line provided.It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.

get.summary: Gets the details of all the delivery addresses of all the items, in all the purchase contracts in the system
get.description: Gets the details of all the delivery addresses of all the items, in all the purchase contracts in the system. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.summary: Adds a delivery address to all the items, in all the purchase contracts in the system
post.description: Adds a delivery address to all the purchase contracts in the system. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.

get.summary: Gets the details of all the delivery addresses of a specific item in a purchase contract
get.description: Gets the delivery address details of a specific item in a purchase contract, such as name, city name, postal code, and so on, using the purchase contract number, item number, and address ID provided.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates the details of all the delivery addresses of a specific item in a purchase contract
patch.description: Updates the details of all the delivery addresses of a specific item in a purchase contract. This is done using the purchase contract number, item number, and address ID provided.It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.

get.summary: Gets all the item notes in the system
get.description: Gets all the item notes in all the purchase contracts in the system. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.summary: Creates a new item note for a purchase contract
post.description: Creates a new item note for a purchase contract. This operation uses the number of the purchase contract, item number, text ID that identifies the type of note, and language key provided.It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.

get.summary: Gets the item notes of a specific purchase contract
get.description: Gets the item notes of a specific purchase contract. This operation uses the number of the purchase contract or object ID of the purchasing document note, text ID that identifies the type of note, and language key provided.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates the item notes of a purchase contract
patch.description: Updates the item notes of a purchase contract. This operation uses the number of the purchase contract, item number, text ID that identifies the type of note, and language key provided.It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.

get.summary: Gets the details of all the items, in all the purchase contracts in the system
get.description: Gets the details of all the items, in all the purchase contracts in the system. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

post.summary: Creates an item in all the purchase contracts in the system
post.description: Creates an item in all the purchase contracts in the system. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.

get.summary: Gets the item details of an item in a purchase contract
get.description: Gets the item details such as material, plant, quantity, and so on of an item in a purchase contract, using the purchase contract and item number provided.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates an item in a purchase contract
patch.description: Updates details of an item in a purchase contract using the purchase contract and item number provided. It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.

post.description: Adds a business partner to all the purchase contracts in the system. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.

get.summary: Gets the partner details of a purchase contract
get.description: Gets the partner details such as partner function, purchasing organization, and so on in a purchase contract, using the purchase contract number, item number, purchasing organization, plant, partner function, partner counter, and supplier sub range provided.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates the partner details of a purchase contract
patch.description: Updates the partner details such as partner function, purchasing organization, and so on in a purchase contract. This is done using the purchase contract number, item number, purchasing organization, plant, partner function, partner counter, and supplier sub range provided.It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.

get.summary: Gets the header details of all the purchase contracts in the system
get.description: Gets the header details of all the purchase contracts in the system. This operation filters and sorts the returned data. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.

parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_PurCtrAccount HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
